name: Save the CORE
description:
Your team found a new powersource, that can change the world. But it´s extremely unstable, so you have to test it, and that´s what you will do. But be carrefull, in the instructions they left to you, they said that you should never use it´s max power, so...

DON`T DO IT!

_______________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

You can controll almost everything with your mouse. So the exceptions are:

ESCAPE: Quit the game

D: Debug menu...
